comment.author: 9003948@N05
comment._content: This view hasn't changed much today, though the roofs are no longer thatched. The trams are still running, as they have done since 1893. If you are lucky you may see one of the original cars of 1893. However the day-to-day is maintained by cars dating from 1899!

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: It has changed enough, as you can see on this photos from 2011: www.geograph.org.uk/photo/2258034 www.geograph.org.uk/photo/2258042 The building in the background has vanished.
